summary: Based on a factual case involving Diane Schaefer and Dr. Murray Brennan, a woman's claims of having had a relationship with a prominent doctor are completely denied by him.
cast: Jenna Elfman|Kate Burton|Lisa Edelstein|Jane Wheeler|Mark Camacho|Vlasta Vrana|Charles Edwin Powell|Sam Robards|Linda E. Smith|Giancarlo Caltabiano|Holly Uloth|Lynne Adams|Sheena Larkin|Tyrone Benskin|Laura Mitchell|Amy Sloan|Lisa Bronwyn Moore|Richard Jutras|Robert Ozores|Paula Jean Hixson|Kwasi Songui|Claudia Besso|Tony Calabretta|Danny Blanco Hall|Amanda Strawn|Carl Alacchi|James Rae|Howard Bilerman|Lois Dellar|Kerrilyn Keith|Bonnie Mak|Matthew Rothpan|Tanya Trombetta|Don Jordan|Janis Kirshner|Mariah Inger|Heidi Foss|Kevin Woodhouse|Maïta Lavoie
title: Obsesión
